name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: EXCLUSIVE | NYC pols are demanding an independent investigation of NYPD conduct during the George Floyd protests. 

They're challenging Mayor de Blasio’s move to have his appointees handle the investigation.

text:
Cuomo ripped into Trump over his promise to use the military to quell the George Floyd protests.

He accused the president of using military action to create a photo opportunity for himself.
